div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 515 Nucet Gornet, 20 km. NE of Ploiesti, Rumania, before 1942 Burial: c. 150-125 B.C. (T) Contents: AR Macedonia, 1st Region: tetradr. Thasos: spread-flan tetradr. Disposition: Bucharest (Acad.) 1 Macedonia Moisil, Balcania 1944, p. 15, no. 19
